project.description: Verify job created by CodeGuard. Any manual updates to this job will be overwritten by subsequent builds.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u $username:$password @bitbucketBaseURL@/rest/api/1.0/projects/@project@/repos/@repo@/pull-requests/$pr/comments -X POST -d "{\"text\":\"Started new verification job [(view jenkins console)](@jenkinsurl@/job/@project@_@repo@_verify/$BUILD_NUMBER/console)\"}" ./codeguard/verify.sh RETURN_CODE=$? if [ "$RETURN_CODE" = "0" ]; then curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u $username:$password @bitbucketBaseURL@/rest/api/1.0/projects/@project@/repos/@repo@/pull-requests/$pr/comments -X POST -d "{\"text\":\"\u2714 Verification job _succeeded_ [(view jenkins console)](@jenkinsurl@/job/@project@_@repo@_verify/$BUILD_NUMBER/console)\"}" else curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -u $username:$password @bitbucketBaseURL@/rest/api/1.0/projects/@project@/repos/@repo@/pull-requests/$pr/comments -X POST -d "{\"text\":\"\u2716 Verification job _failed_ [(view jenkins console)](@jenkinsurl@/job/@project@_@repo@_verify/$BUILD_NUMBER/console)\"}" exit $RETURN_CODE fi
